'''''Fly Fishing in Middle-earth''''' is a collection of poetry by Steve Peck.<ref>"[http://fanlore.org/wiki/Fly_Fishing_in_Middle-Earth Fly Fishing in Middle-earth]" at [http://fanlore.org/wiki/Main_Page Fanlore.org] (accessed 15 March 2011)</ref><ref>"[http://moldychum.typepad.com/moldy_chum/2007/02/fly_fishing_in_.html Fly Fishing in Middle Earth (February 19, 2007)]" at [http://moldychum.typepad.com/moldy_chum/ MoldyChum (blog)] (accessed 15 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&_trksid=p4340.l2557&item=370489189483&nma=true&rt=nc&si=v1ZwnIRahaC2%252FQOxINWrm1GWH9c%253D#ht_500wt_949 Tolkien Fly Fishing in Middle Earth (item number:370489189483)] at [http://www.ebay.com/ Ebay.com] (accessed 15 March 2011)</ref>

==From the publisher==

"Poet Steve Peck relates in verse his adventures while vacationing in Middle-earth, and getting in some unusual fly fishing on some of the most famous rivers in fantasy, with companions ranging from Tom Bombadil to Sam Gamgee. His whimsical observations are irresistible to the well-versed Tolkien fan."
